title: Add FO-08 prompts to KV store seed file
description:
Add FO-08 agent prompts to the KV store seed file.

File to modify:
- `src/db/seed.ts`

Implementation:
1. Add FO-08 discovery prompts (copy FO-07 structure, modify for hybrid fragments):
   - `versions.fo-08-discovery._info.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-discovery._model_name.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-discovery._temperature.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-discovery.system.default` (with full hybrid fragment prompt)
   - `versions.fo-08-discovery.prompt.default`

2. Add FO-08 affirmation prompts (copy from FO-07):
   - `versions.fo-08-affirmation._info.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-affirmation._model_name.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-affirmation._temperature.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-affirmation.system.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-affirmation.prompt.default`

3. Add FO-08 summary prompts (copy from FO-07):
   - `versions.fo-08-summary._info.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-summary._model_name.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-summary._temperature.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-summary.system.default`
   - `versions.fo-08-summary.prompt.default`

⚠️ Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'fo-08-discovery' src/db/seed.ts && grep -q 'fo-08-affirmation' src/db/seed.ts && grep -q 'fo-08-summary' src/db/seed.ts && echo 'PASS' shows PASS
